game.name: Asteroid Patrol
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bang bang! Shoot raining asteroids, dodge attacks of flying insects and battle against huge weird monsters! Gain exp, level up, pick perk and then rinse & repeat. Story? Nobody cares. If you are looking for a difficult and punishing game, don't leave without playing this one.
